pullRequest.title: DHFPROD-4866: Fix placement of ellipsis for array values
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Fix placement of ellipsis for array values.
Checklist:
- Note: do not change the below


Owner:


 JIRA_ID included in all the commit messages


 PR title is in the format JIRA_ID:Title


 Rebase the branch with upstream


 Squashed all commits into a single commit


 Added Tests


Reviewer:


 Reviewed Tests

nodes.bodyText: This file is only used for testing, right? I recommend adding the word "test" to it somewhere - my first though on seeing this was - why isn't the server providing this data to the UI? But I believe it's just mock data for testing purposes. The filename should imply that.

nodes.bodyText: can we create a separate test and use an inline jsonResponse object particular to the test. This is going to affect the sorting tests. Are all the unit tests passing with this change locally?
